categories.name: Baseline Water Stress
categories.description: Ratio of total water withdrawals to available renewable water supply (WRI Aqueduct indicator)

categories.name: Seasonal Variability
categories.description: Coefficient of variation of monthly available water supply (WRI Aqueduct indicator)

categories.name: Interannual Variability
categories.description: Coefficient of variation of annual available water supply (WRI Aqueduct indicator)

categories.name: Groundwater Table Decline
categories.description: Average groundwater table decline rate (WRI Aqueduct indicator)
categories.methodology: Linear trend in groundwater head over time

categories.name: Drought Risk
categories.description: Number of months with drought conditions (SPI < -1.5) from 1950-2014 (WRI Aqueduct indicator)

categories.name: Riverine Flood Risk
categories.description: Percentage of population exposed to 1-in-100 year riverine floods (WRI Aqueduct indicator)

combined_index.description: WRI Aqueduct aggregation: weighted average of physical risk indicators

citation: WRI (2019). Aqueduct 4.0. World Resources Institute. https://www.wri.org/aqueduct
